bib.title: Quantifying social network dynamics
bib.author: Michalski, Radoslaw and Br{\'o}dka, Piotr and Kazienko, Przemys{\l}aw and Juszczyszyn, Krzysztof
bib.abstract: The dynamic character of most social networks requires to model evolution of networks in order to enable complex analysis of theirs dynamics. The following paper focuses on the definition of differences between network snapshots by means of Graph Differential Tuple
bib.booktitle: 2012 Fourth International Conference on Computational Aspects of Social Networks (CASoN)
